Reviews.Title: Great value & works good
Reviews.Author: Gary L. KIMMY "Digital Guy"
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet so it`s a new & different experience from a desktop. The screen is not as bright as I wish. It`s ok for indoor use, but forget using it outside. I played some old MP1 vivdeo files on it & they play great. I definately reccomend getting the case/keyboard with it. There is an adapter with the tablet to plug in the keyboard. If your eye sight is not that good I think you should consider getting the 10 inch model. It will take a lot of time downloading & installing apps, so be patient with that. Also get a 32gb micro SD card to expand the storage. I do not see the micro HDMI slot as of yet, but dought I would need it anyway. Its ok for reading a book, but the Kindle is probably better for that purpose. Over all it`s a good device for the money.

Reviews.Title: Good price performance
Reviews.Author: Paul Cook "stat guy"
Reviews.Content: Okay, it is not a high-end tablet but if you don't expect a $200 tablet for less than 70 bucks, you will be pleased with this one.Starting off with the minuses:-- The screen is not particularly bright-- The cameras are not particularly good-- The battery life is nothing to write home about.-- The sound is just acceptable.Now for the pluses:-- I was pleasantly surprised by how responsive the touch screen is.-- The screen is quite clear-- The processor is quite fast-- The wifi has a good range-- It has an up-to-date version of Android, so it works well with a lot of appsIt even interfaced directly to an $8 USB keyboard/case.  (See  SANOXY® 7" Tablet Stand with USB Keyboard)I bought my wife a Samsung 7" tablet a year ago and find that this tablet is a real price-performer in comparisonI can recommend this to anyone looking for a kid's tablet, a second tablet, or wanting to play around with a tablet for much less money than the high-end tablets.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Walter Pambabay
Reviews.Content: This tablet buy it for my younger sister and loves it, hours and hours spent playing, there are many games that work perfectly, plus listen to music, or watch a movie, time battery life is very good for the cost one pays is a good product, nothing to envy to other tablet brands above, I myself have thought of buying one for use, if you plan to buy a ideausa, I recommend it.
